additional_information: This script sets environment variables for a WRF-Var data assimilation system, particularly for the con200 application.
It configures directories, time information, WPS and WRF settings, observation processing parameters, and ensemble parameters.
The script is designed to be run on various platforms like LoadLeveller, LSF, and PBS.
It includes logic for setting up PSOT (Pseudo Observation Test) and adjoint sensitivity analysis.
